summary: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.
cast: Kevin Spacey|Julianne Moore|Judi Dench|Cate Blanchett|Pete Postlethwaite|Scott Glenn|Rhys Ifans|Gordon Pinsent|Jason Behr|Larry Pine|Jeannetta Arnette|Robert Joy|Alyssa Gainer|Kaitlyn Gainer|Lauren Gainer|John Dunsworth|Anthony Cipriano|Kyle Timothy Smith|Ken James|Roman Podhora|Luke Fisher|Terry Daly|Gary Levert|Stephen Morgan|Katherine Moennig|Daniel Kash|Will McAllister|Marc Lawrence|Kathryn Fraser|Nancy Beatty|R.D. Reid|Deborah Grover|Jon Whalen|Nicole Underhay|Emma Taylor-Isherwood|Andrew Fowler|John MacEachern|Jonathan Creaser|Darcy Lindzon
title: Atando cabos
